__e: That's the confusion because we thought, yes, but no.
The confusion and fear... that's there to remind you that somewhere out there is something better.
Eh, I believe her when she said she isn't sure, and when you asked her if she dumped the body in the river, I saw confusion and surprise on her face.
Almost five weeks to sit alone in the confusion of knowing that you...

I don't think the solution is to run away from what's happening in this room, Paul, to protect yourself once again from the risk of a relationship... the confusion, yes, pain that can sometimes go along with one.
So why not watch the mother's pain and confusion?
